title: List of all Android switch  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android switch  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Android-SwitchDateTimePicker
repoList.description: Android library for Date and Time Picker in same dialog

repoList.name: ActivitySwitcher
repoList.description: ActivitySwitcher is based on the Activity view operation management library, you can achieve any jump between Activity, close any Activity and end applications and other functions.

repoList.name: StickySwitch
repoList.description: ⭐️ beautiful switch widget with sticky animation ⭐️

repoList.name: iOS-SwitchView
repoList.description: A lightweight iOS switch view style for Android

repoList.name: StatusLayout
repoList.description: Android Library：A zero-invasion layout that switches data states

repoList.name: ThreeStateSwitch
repoList.description: A simple three-state switch view for Android.

repoList.name: Compressor
repoList.description: An easy to use and well designed image compress library for Android, based on Android native image library. Put forward a framework for quick switch from different compress algorithm.

repoList.name: TabControllerAndroid
repoList.description: Android library for switching between fragments. Developed and maintained by Appolica

repoList.name: android-low-light-theme-switcher
repoList.description: Automatically switch between Dark/Light themes using DayNight theme available in Support Library v23.2
